plan:
Absolutely, here is a basic workout plan designed to suit beginners focused on muscle gain. 

Day 1: Chest and Triceps
1. Bench press: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
2. Dumbbell press: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
3. Incline dumbbell press: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
4. Dumbbell flys: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
5. Tricep dips: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
6. Tricep pushdowns: 3 sets of 10-12 reps

Day 2: Rest

Day 3: Back and Biceps
1. Pull-ups: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
2. Lateral pull-down: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
3. Bent-over rows: 3 sets of 10-12 reps
4. Dumbbell curls
